channel.title: Short Stories | Tales of Murder
channel.description: A murder mystery, crime and detective fiction website.

item.title: Sleuthing For Beauty
item.author: atticus@talesofmurder.com (Sally Sherlock)
item.description: Even a Wedding Has Problems That Must Be Solved. And Suzanne Learns the Folly of Trying to Make a Mystery of Her Honeymoon When the Beauty Sleuth Is on the Case!
